abilities.Jaws: [one-action] melee +12 [+7/+2] (reach 10 feet), Damage 1d10+5 piercing plus Grab or Knockdown
abilities.Pack Attack: The dire wolf's Strikes deal 1d6 extra damage to creatures within reach of at least two of the wolf's allies.
abilities.Worry: [one-action] (attack) Requirements The dire wolf has a creature grabbed or restrained in its jaws; Effect The dire wolf fiercely shakes the creature with its teeth, dealing 1d10+2 damage with a DC 20 basic Fortitude save.
